full_summary:
# Tender Notice
**Job Title:** Requirement for Tablet Computers
**Job Title (French):*****Ordinateurs tablettes***

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number:** WS3745560294/Doc3745560344
- **Public Notice Date:** November 11, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** November 11, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** November 24, 2023

## Job Description:
This solicitation involves the procurement of tablet computers for the Department of National Defence (DND). The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of DND, which will place orders with qualified suppliers.

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others. 
- **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** John Charette
- **Email:** [john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Department:** **SPAC/PSPC**

## Notice URL
- **English:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14608679?extsite=MTQ2MDg2NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **French:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14608679?extsite=MTQ2MDg2NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
